name: How Much?
description:
Answer a series of true or false questions to earn coins.

First, you are given the category and difficulty. Place your bet before the question is revealed. If you're right, you win some coins, if you're wrong you lose 'em.

Credits:

  • https://opentdb.com/ for the free and simple trivia question API
  • https://lospec.com/palette-list/feelthesun-16 for the palette
  • https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone for the sound effects generator app
